dapps.name: Axie Infinity
dapps.description: Axie Infinity is a game about collecting and raising fantasy creatures called Axie, on the Ethereum platform.

dapps.name: Cent
dapps.description: Give wisdom, get money. Ask a question and offer a bounty for the best answers. The userbase then votes to determine which answers receive that bounty.

dapps.name: ChainMonsters
dapps.description: ChainMonsters is a 100% blockchain based monster collectible game. Every action you take, every ChainMonster you catch will be reflected in the game and on blockchain itself.
